Package com.medilabo.microrisk.service

Class RiskService

java.lang.Object
com.medilabo.microrisk.service.RiskService
@Service public class RiskService extends Object
Service class for calculating risk levels for patients based on their age, gender, and notes. Provides methods for fetching patient data and analyzing note contents.

  • Constructor Details

    • RiskService

      public RiskService()

  • Method Details

    • fetchBirthDate

      public LocalDate fetchBirthDate(@PathVariable Long id, @CookieValue(value="token",required=false) String token)
      Fetches the birthdate of a patient by making a REST call to the patient microservice (microlabo) through the gateway. The request is authenticated using a cookie containing the token.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the patient
      token - the authentication token retrieved from the cookie
      Returns:
      the birthdate of the patient

    • fetchGender

      public String fetchGender(@PathVariable Long id, @CookieValue(value="token",required=false) String token)
      Fetches the gender of a patient by making a REST call to the patient microservice (microlabo) through the gateway. The request is authenticated using a cookie containing the token.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the patient
      token - the authentication token retrieved from the cookie
      Returns:
      the gender of the patient

    • calculateAge

      public int calculateAge(Long patientId, @CookieValue(value="token",required=false) String token)
      Calculates the age of a patient based on their birthdate. The method retrieves the birthdate using the authentication token from the cookie.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      token - the authentication token retrieved from the cookie
      Returns:
      the age of the patient, or 0 if birthdate is not available

    • getRiskWords

      public List<String> getRiskWords()
      Retrieves a list of risk words used to determine the patient's risk level.
      Returns:
      a list of risk words

    • getExclusionWords

      public List<String> getExclusionWords()
      Retrieves a list of exclusion words used to filter out certain combinations from being counted as risk factors. Helps fine tune the algorithm.
      Returns:
      a list of exclusion words

    • getRiskWordsOccurrences

      public long getRiskWordsOccurrences(Long patientId)
      Counts the occurrences of risk words in the contents of the notes of a specific patient, excluding occurrences where exclusion words are present.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient whose notes will be analyzed
      Returns:
      the count of risk words in the patient's notes after applying exclusion logic

    • calculateRiskForPatient

      public String calculateRiskForPatient(Long patientId, @CookieValue(value="token",required=false) String token)
      Determines the risk level for a patient based on their age, gender, and the risk words found in their notes. The method retrieves the necessary patient information using the authentication token from the cookie.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient
      token - the authentication token retrieved from the cookie
      Returns:
      a string representing the risk level ("None", "Borderline", "In Danger", "Early onset")
